name: ZW - Sylphid Wing
text: You can only control 1 "ZW - Sylphid Wing". You can target 1 "Utopia" monster you control; equip this card from your hand or field to it as an Equip Spell that gives it 800 ATK. Once per turn, if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) by an activated effect: You can have the equipped monster gain 1600 ATK. If the equipped monster would activate an effect by detaching material(s), you can send this card to the GY instead of 1 of those materials.
